string.name: my_text
string.br: This is an android application development workshop.
It is organised by the APSSDC under the Andhra Pradesh.
You can register using this link http://engineering.apssdc.in.
I am an android trainer with name as Chaitanya K.
My Official Email id is chaitanya.karri@apssdc.in.
